rules: Fade-in + slight slide-up (10px) for page loads.
Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text.
Focus states must be clearly visible (ring-2).
All images must have descriptive alt text.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Avoid 'Startu-y' illustrations. Use photography or clean iconography.
Forms in the booking flow must be single-column on mobile.
Admin dashboard must prioritize data density without clutter.
Use Czech language for all hardcoded text in the codebase, but wrap in i18n keys.
Data-testids are mandatory for all interactive elements.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a cultural booking system. Respect the 'Institutional Zen' vibe. The frontend is the face of public institutions - it must be perfect, accessible, and stable. Prioritize the Mobile Booking Flow - this is where the money is made. Ensure the Admin Dashboard handles complex schedules easily. Use the provided image URLs for the marketing site.
